meanings.definition: Full of puns or making puns.
meanings.sent1: She is so punny, always making us laugh with her clever wordplay.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's punny jokes had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent3: His punny remarks at the party kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent4: The punny banter between the characters added a lighthearted touch to the movie.
meanings.sent5: The punny t-shirt slogans were a hit at the event.

meanings.definition: A play on words; a humorous use of a word or phrase with multiple meanings.
meanings.sent1: The punny in the joke made it even funnier.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't resist a good punny when the opportunity arose.
meanings.sent3: The punny in the advertisement caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: His clever punny was the highlight of the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The punny in the book made it an enjoyable read.
